00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_CALLBACK_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_CALLBACK_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 
00034 #include <QtCore/QObject>
00035 #include <QtCore/QEvent>
00036 
00037 #include "mimas/Button.h"
00038 
00039 #include <string>
00040 
00041 namespace mimas {
00042 
00043 class Application;
00044 class Slider;
00045 
00052 class Callback : public QObject, public lubyk::ThreadedLuaObject
00053 {
00054   Q_OBJECT
00055 public:
00056   // Our own custom event id
00057   static const QEvent::Type EventType;
00058 
00059   Callback() : self_in_app_(-1) {
00060     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00061   }
00062 
00063   virtual ~Callback() {
00064     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00065   }
00066 
00067   void connect(QObject *obj, const char *method, const char *callback) {
00068     QObject::connect(obj, method, this, callback);
00069   }
00070 
00073   class Event : public QEvent
00074   {
00075     public:
00076       Callback *callback_;
00077 
00078       Event(Callback *clbk)
00079         : QEvent(Callback::EventType),
00080           callback_(clbk) {}
00081   };
00082 
00083 public slots:
00084   void callback() {
00085     lua_State *L = lua_;
00086 
00087     if (!pushLuaCallback("callback")) return;
00088     // <func> <self>
00089     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00090     if (status) {
00091       printf("Error in 'callback': %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00092     }
00093 
00094     deleteOnCall();
00095   }
00096 
00097   void callback(double value) {
00098     lua_State *L = lua_;
00099 
00100     if (!pushLuaCallback("callback")) return;
00101     lua_pushnumber(L, value);
00102     // <func> <self> <number>
00103     int status = lua_pcall(L, 2, 0, 0);
00104 
00105     if (status) {
00106       fprintf(stderr, "Error in receive callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(lua_, -1));
00107     }
00108 
00109     deleteOnCall();
00110   }
00111 
00112   void callback(int value) {
00113     callback((double)value);
00114   }
00115 
00116 private:
00117   friend class Application;
00118   friend class Slider;
00119 
00123   void setCallbackFromApp(lua_State *L) {
00124     // ... <app> <func> <clbk>
00125     lua_pushlstring(L, "callback", 8);
00126     // ... <app> <func> <clbk> <'callback'>
00127     lua_pushvalue(L, -3);
00128     // ... <app> <func> <clbk> <'callback'> <func>
00129     lua_settable(L, -3);  // clbk.callback = func
00130     // ... <app> <func> <clbk>
00131     lua_pushvalue(L, -1);
00132     // ... <app> <func> <clbk> <clbk>
00133     self_in_app_ = luaL_ref(L, -4);
00134     // ... <app> <func> <clbk>
00135 
00136 
00137     // Now store 'app' in the callback to remove oneself on delete.
00138     lua_pushvalue(L, -3);
00139     // L    = ... <app> <func> <clbk> <app>
00140     lua_xmove(L, lua_, 1);
00141     // L    = ... <app> <func> <clbk>
00142     // lua_ = ... <app>
00143     app_in_thread_ = luaL_ref(lua_, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
00144     // lua_ = ...
00145     // L    = ... <app> <func> <clbk>
00146   }
00147 
00148   void deleteOnCall() {
00149     if (self_in_app_ != -1) {
00150       lua_rawgeti(lua_, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, app_in_thread_);
00151       // ... <app>
00152       // cut link from app to callback: app->clbk
00153       luaL_unref(lua_, -1, self_in_app_);
00154       // Now the callback is not reachable and will be GC
00155       self_in_app_ = -1;
00156     }
00157   }
00158 
00161   int self_in_app_;
00162 
00165   int app_in_thread_;
00166 };
00167 
00168 } // mimas
00169 
00170 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_CALLBACK_H_
